title: Ep 37 :: What Happened to the Double-Dip?
itunes:title: What Happened to the Double-Dip?
description: The S&P 500 is up 8% in July. Charles Payne, founder of Wall Street Strategies, predicts the next 10% move in the major index. Also, Dan Farris - editor of S&A's Extreme Value newsletter - tells us why "buy and hold' is back.
content:encoded: The S&P 500 is up 8% in July. Charles Payne, founder of Wall Street Strategies, predicts the next 10% move in the major index. Also, Dan Farris - editor of S&A's Extreme Value newsletter - tells us why "buy and hold' is back.
